p: However, coating of PE films with a solution containing different levels of carvacrol and menthol did not show a significant effect on the a* color index, and the values of this color index were in the range of 10.29 to 10.50. In terms of the b* color index, coating of PE films with different concentrations of carvacrol and menthol led to a significant reduction in this color index ( pÂ <.05), so that the highest value of b* index was observed in the control sample (6.74) and the lowest amounts were related to the films coated with 2% carvacrol (5.82).
